sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { ListGroup, Carousel, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function Home() { let [news, setNews] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch( "https://newsapi.org/v2/everything?q=ethereum&from=2021-02-13&to=2021-02-13&sortBy=publishedAt&apiKey=bd1b1115c38a49108c822a9fb636a598&language=en" ) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { if (data.status == "ok") { setNews(data.articles); } }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }, []); return ( <> Articles: Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Last News: {news.map((item) => ( {item.title} {item.description} ))} ); }
